title: Video: Young Magic – Sparkly
body:
Fresh from touring with Boise sensation **Youth Lagoon** earlier in the year, **Young Magic** have dropped a new track, as well as confirming details of their debut full length record.

_Sparkly_ is a glittering ethereal number, dreamily perceptive and wonderfully stirring, mirrored perfectly by the serene video, swinging between idyllic beaches and psychedelic mashes of vibrant colors. Taken from their debut LP **_Melt_**, due out on 14 February via **Carpark Records**, 2012 is set to be an important year for **Young Magic**.

Directed and Shot by Dylan Wiehahn  
Production Design/Construction by Kell Bendle  
Costume by Kiara Bulley  
Featuring Megan Elizabeth McKee  
Edited by Bek Andersen
